fieldUpdates.formula: Case(AM_Job_Type__c, "AC - Crating Services", "AC", "AR - ArtSpace", "AR", "AS - Airport Supervision", "AS", "AX - Anything & Everything", "AX", "DS - Destination Services", "DS", "IM - International Move", "IM", "IT - Third Party Management", "IT", "LS - Local Services", "LS", "MP - Manpower", "MP", "OS - Origin Services", "OS", "PC - Carton Box", "PC", "PD - Permit Declaration", "PD", "PR - Project", "PR", "ST - Storage", "ST", "AX")

rules.description: To notify Accounts department if there is a new HHG OB Job
To notify Accounts department if there is a new HHG OB Job (Testing)
rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Outbound', RecordType.Name = 'Agent Booked', RecordType.Name = 'Personal Account', RecordType.Name = 'Corporate Account'), !ISBLANK(TEXT(HHG_Initials__c)), !ISBLANK(OB_Job_Number__c), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won'), CloseDate = TODAY() )

rules.description: To notify Accounts department if there is a change of HHG OB Job (Testing)
rules.formula: AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Outbound', RecordType.Name = 'Agent Booked', RecordType.Name = 'Personal Account', RecordType.Name = 'Corporate Account'), !ISBLANK(OB_Job_Number__c), ISCHANGED( OB_Job_Number__c ), ISPICKVAL(StageName , "Closed Won") )
